DOC.brief_summary: This study use transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS ) investigate brain control movement send message spinal cord muscle . Healthy normal volunteer 21 year age old may participate study . They must medical , neurological psychiatric illness take medication affect nervous system function . Participants undergo transcranial magnetic stimulation . For procedure , insulated wire coil place scalp skin . A brief electrical current pass coil , create magnetic pulse stimulate brain . If coil place nerve area brain control muscle , may cause muscle twitch , possibly strong enough move limb . In case , subject may feel movement feel tingle sensation limb . Stimulation muscle side head may cause discomfort area twitch jaw . During stimulation , subject may ask tense certain muscle slightly perform simple action . The electrical activity muscle activate stimulation record use metal electrode tap skin muscle . In case , study take less 3 hour .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Free Will
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study investigate influence transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS ) free select movement . There debate human voluntary movement reflexive rather volitional nature , although people feel movement freely choose . This issue illuminate previous TMS study show external bias freely choose movement TMS . Recently , try confirm observation use reliable method subthreshold TMS , fail . Thus , study , plan use suprathreshold TMS test whether type stimulation different motor area influence free selection movement .
DOC.criteria: Normal adult volunteer 21 year older eligible . Volunteers either medicosurgical , neurological psychiatric illness , take medication potential influence nervous system function , pacemaker , implant medical pump , metal plate metal object skull eye ( example , brain surgery ) , history seizure disorder , exclude .
